cv_text:
Artificial  Intelligence  undergraduate  with  experience  in  back-end  and  full-stack  development  using  Node.js,  Express.js,  and
MongoDB. Skilled in RESTful API design, role-based access control, and database optimization with practical exposure to real-
time data processing and scalable architectures. Experienced in delivering projects across complaint management, computer
vision–based exam monitoring, and airport surveillance systems. Certified in Big Data technologies with strong problem-solving,
Git/GitHub, and collaborative development skills.
Baraa Wael
+201029290728 | baraawael7901@gmail.com | LinkedIn | GitHub | GitLab | Mansoura, Dakahlia, Egypt
 Web Application Developer
KEY COMPETENCIES 
     PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Node.js Development
Express.js Framework
MongoDB Database Design & Integration
Data Modeling & Schema Design 
RESTful API Development
Authentication & Authorization (JWT, OAuth)
Database Query Optimization
Backend Architecture Design
Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
API Security & Data Validation
Python, JavaScript
Git & GitHub
Socket.io, Docker, Linux, CI/CD Pipelines
Problem Solving
Communication Skills
2024 – Present
Freelance Web Application Developer
Develop and deliver custom database-driven web applications tailored to client requirements.
Design and implement secure, scalable RESTful APIs to support dynamic front-end features.
Integrate interactive dashboards for real-time data visualization and performance tracking.
Optimize database queries and workflows to ensure efficient, seamless data flow across systems.
Apply responsive design principles to deliver cross-platform, user-friendly web applications.
     EDUCATION
Bachelor of Artificial Intelligence
Delta University for Science and Technology 
 GPA: 3.3 / 4.0
2027
2024Computer Vision Developer – Faculty of AI, Delta University 
Engineered a real-time facial tracking and gaze analysis module to support secure online examination environments.
Deployed the module into a web-based platform with integrated full-screen lockdown and automated reporting of suspicious
activity.
Designed and optimized computer vision pipelines with Python and OpenCV to enhance detection precision and reliability.
Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team, strengthening expertise in version control and collaborative workflows using Git
and GitHub.
Gained practical experience in AI system deployment and seamless integration within production-level applications.
2025 – Aug 2025Big Data Trainee – NTI
Completed hands-on training in Big Data technologies with a focus on data processing, storage, and analytics.
Gained practical experience with the Hadoop ecosystem, Spark, and distributed computing frameworks.
Applied Big Data concepts to backend scenarios, enhancing proficiency in scalable, data-driven applications.
Designed and executed data workflows for batch and real-time processing to simulate industry use cases.
Strengthened  problem-solving  and  technical  skills  by  working  on  end-to-end  data  pipelines  and  system  performance
optimization.
2024 – PresentBackend Developer – Self-Learning Projects 
Developed multiple back-end and full-stack applications leveraging Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs, integrated databases, and applied Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) across projects.
Utilized Git and GitHub for version control, collaborative workflows, and project documentation.

Organize and promote student activities, workshops, and technical events while managing public relations to increase visibility
and community engagement.
Enhance communication, collaboration, and teamwork skills through active involvement in volunteer initiatives.
PROJECTS
Arabic: Native             English: Professional Working Proficiency
LANGUAGE
VOLUNTEERING
Public Relations Volunteer | IEEE Student Branch2024 – Present
Led back-end development and integrated a computer vision module to detect real-time cheating behaviors during exam.
Engineered optimized data pipelines with automated alert notifications for immediate incident reporting.
Ensured robust back-end and front-end integration to enable seamless live monitoring and user interaction.
Cheating Detection System (Team Project – Grade: A)
Python, OpenCV, Web Integration
Designed  and  implemented a  facial  recognition  surveillance  system  to  identify  criminals  and  fraud  suspects  in  airport
environments.
Developed a live camera streaming dashboard to monitor, track, and log entry/exit activity in real time.
Built an interactive admin dashboard with event logs and real-time suspect tracking, delivering a production-ready full-stack
solution with a robust back end, clean UI, and advanced computer vision capabilities.
Airport Criminal & Fraud Detection System (Solo Project – Grade: A)
Developed a comprehensive system with multiple modules:
VIP Customers: Managed customer profiles and applied automated loyalty discounts.
Inventory Management: Tracked stock levels, suppliers, and product details.
Sales: Recorded daily sales, applied discounts, and generated detailed reports.
Cashier (POS): Built a user-friendly interface with QR Code scanning for faster checkout.
Implemented role-based access control for admins, cashiers, and inventory managers.
Integrated real-time database updates to ensure stock and sales accuracy.
Supermarket Management System with QR Code Support (Freelance Project)
Engineered a full-stack web solution to streamline complaint management in the hospitality industry.
Implemented Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) to define permissions for customers, employees, and management.
Designed an escalation workflow enabling complaint submission, tracking, and resolution.
Integrated real-time notifications and dynamic status updates to improve responsiveness.
Structured MongoDB with detailed history logs to ensure traceability and data integrity.
Your Solution - Complaint Management System (Full-Stack Web App) (Freelance Project)
Backend: Node.js with Express.js | Frontend: Next.js | Database: MongoDB LINK
Designed and deployed relational database systems to manage hospital, factory, and school operations efficiently.
Built desktop applications with C# (Windows Forms) to provide intuitive user interfaces for staff and administrators.
Optimized database schemas and validation logic, reducing data entry errors by ~30% and improving overall reliability.
Database Systems for Hospital, Factory, and School (Desktop Applications)
MySQL, C#, Visual Studio
CERTIFICATIONS
Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB Development
Problem Solving & Logical Thinking Skills
job_descriptions: 1. Back-End Developer (Node.js & Express) As a Back-End Developer, you will be responsible for designing and building scalable RESTful APIs and managing server-side logic and database interactions. You’ll collaborate closely with front-end developers to deliver seamless, secure, and high-performance web applications. Skills: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB/MySQL, JWT, Git, REST API design, Error handling, Performance optimization. Responsibilities: Develop and maintain APIs and microservices. Integrate third-party APIs (payment, SMS, etc.). Ensure security and data protection. Optimize performance and scalability. Write clean, testable, and maintainable code.
